store.Winds",{extend:Ext.data.ArrayStore,config:{url:"http://metobs.ssec.wisc.edu/app/mendota/buoy/data/jsonp",symbols:"dir:spd:wt_1.0",interval:"00:00:00",begin:"-00:05:00",averageKnots:0,gusts:0,weightedAverage:true,windDirectionRose:"",waterTemperature:0,groupField:"windDirectionRose",fields:["windDirectionDegrees","metersPerSecond","time","windDirectionRose","windSpeedKnots","waterTemperature"],},fetch:function(){var a=this;Ext.data.JsonP.request({url:this.getUrl(),params:{symbols:this.getSymbols(),begin:this.getBegin(),interval:this.getInterval()},success:function(b){var s=[];var f=[0,0,0];var o=0;var g=b.stamps.length;var u=b.data;var c=b.stamps;for(var q=0;q<g;q++){if(a.getWeightedAverage()&&((q==0)||((q+1)==g))){continue}var l=u[q][0];var m;if(a.getWeightedAverage()){m=(u[q-1][1]+u[q][1]+u[q+1][1])/3}else{m=u[q][1]}var j=moment(c[q]+"Z").toDate();var t=HooferSailingMobile.util.Compass.degreesToRose(l);var p=(m*1.94384);var k=u[q][2];s.push([l,m,j,t,p,k]);o+=p;var n=u[q][1]*1.94384;for(var h=0;h<f.length;h++){if(n>f[h]){f[h]=p;break}}}a.setData(s);a.setWaterTemperature(k);var v=a.getGroups();var e=v[0];Ext.Array.forEach(v,function(d){if(d.children.length>e.children.length){e=d}});a.setWindDirectionRose(e.name);var r=Ext.Array.pluck(s,"knots");a.setAverageKnots(Math.round(o/s.length));a.setGusts(Math.round(Ext.Array.mean(f)));a.fireEvent("fetch",a)}})
